name: scores-ly
description: Initiative by Joakim Sandstr√∂m. Tech support by Tobias Skarhed.

scripts.build: npm run build:songs && npm run build:pre-11ty && npm run build:11ty
scripts.clean: cd songs && find . -name '*.svg' -type f -delete && find . -name '*.midi' -type f -delete && find . -name '*.svg' -type f -delete
